Text:
JCinema,
Great uploads. Have any idea where the pbs documentaries are of Japanese film directors is? It was accompanied by a film from each. This is how I saw "Boy" for the first time. I remember seeing it in the 1970s ( I think). It was fablulous. Also, can you provide a listing of films you plan to release here. Your taste is amazing.
Thanks again.One of the 5 best uploaders on TPB.More power to you.
